name: Brown Sugar Cookies
description: There is a hint of cinnamon and ground ginger in these cookies.
recipeIngredient: 12 tablespoons unsalted butter, at room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 375°F. Line two baking sheets with parchment paper.
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, cinnamon, salt, and ginger. Set aside.
In a large bowl, beat together butter and sugar until creamy, about 3 minutes. Add egg and beat to combine.
Add flour mixture to bowl and beat until just incorporated. Drop dough by the rounded tablespoon onto prepared baking sheets.
Bake cookies until slightly brown and cracked on top, about 10 minutes.
